body: They are showing as ClosedBrep because that is what they are in Grasshopper. To answer rest of your questions besides what Devang has already answered. 1. To see the name and the program of the zone you can connect them to askMe component. 2. You can access loads and schedules by using the components under tab 05. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DhFoEGRtzw5RK8MIkUYyUFAORiIUpcvfgFwGZRs-KPUahz5h9he1udN1M2HNMLZSrdWmdP8B5zjPfeZzRBHRx2cb3ngIjdqZ/schedules_loads.png)
